content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0) 
-  Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0) 
-  Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0) 
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0) 

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a chest at position(-16.5, -49.5)

### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 10.5, 10.5), boiler(position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with no input

### Inserter system at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position 3.5, 0.5) and chest at position(2.5, 0.5)

### Inserter system at position(0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position 0.5, 3.5) and chest at position(0.5, 2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when trying to use a burner mining drill without fuel
- Make sure to fuel the burner mining drill before using it
### Errors when trying to use a boiler without fuel
- Make sure to fuel the boiler before using it
### Errors when trying to use a steam engine without input liquid
- Make sure to connect the steam engine to a boiler and offshore pump to provide input liquid
### Errors when trying to use a furnace without ingredients to smelt
- Make sure to provide ingredients to the furnace before using it
### Errors when trying to use a lab without research in progress
- Make sure to provide a research pack to the lab before using it
### Errors when trying to use a burner inserter without source items
- Make sure to provide source items to the burner inserter before using it
### Errors when trying to use a pipe group without fluid
- Make sure to connect the pipe group to a fluid source before using it
